butterknife

Annotation Type OnFocusChange


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=CLASS)
public @interface OnFocusChange
    Bind a method to an OnFocusChangeListener on the view for each ID specified. 
    
  @OnFocusChange(R.id.example) void onFocusChanged(boolean focused) {
   Toast.makeText(this, focused ? "Gained focus" : "Lost focus", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
 }
    Any number of parameters from onFocusChange may be used on the method.
    See Also:
    View.OnFocusChangeListener

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int[] value
      View IDs to which the method will be bound.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract int[] value
        View IDs to which the method will be bound.
        Default:
        -1
